title: Littlest Pet Shop (2012 TV series)
summary: Littlest Pet Shop is an animated children's television series produced by DHX Media and Hasbro Studios for The Hub, and is animated in Flash. Based on the Littlest Pet Shop and Blythe toyline by Hasbro, the show centers on Blythe Baxter, a teen girl who, after moving into an apartment in a city, gains the ability to communicate with animals.[1] Located below her apartment is the eponymous pet store where Blythe works and talks to a group of pets who regularly reside at a day care in the shop. Worried that a corrupt rival business will drive their shop out of business, the pets depend on Blythe to drive business into the store with her pet fashion designs.
